segments.text: I couldn't look at you , and say you aren't beautiful !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , Miss Anna , you must let me say how lovely you are ! What's wrong with that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know that everybody notices how beautiful you are , don't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , no-that is , I've heard Linda say they do , but ... Thank you . But please don't speak to me again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , Miss Anna ! That's too hard ! I won't be here long .
segments.speaker: S1
